charges.charge_description: 21 U.S.C. section 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B) and 18 U.S.C. section 2: Possession with intent to distribute a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of heroin, namely 100 grams or more of a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of heroin.

21 USC 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B) and 18 USC 2 Possession with intent to distribute a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of heroin, namely 100 grams or more of a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of heroin(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant remanded to the custody of AG/BOP for Time Served on Count 1. $O Fine due to inability to satisfy, hardship on dependant and c/s ordered on Count 1 of the Indictment. $100 SA. 5 Years SR on Count 1. 100 Hours Community Service. Defendant's rights of appeal explained and understood.
